functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Creates the container <page>DListLayout</page> for the <page>DTree_Node</page>s.

This is called automatically so you don't have to.

functions.name: DoChildrenOrder
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Called automatically to update the status of <page>DTree_Node:GetLastChild</page> on children of this node.

functions.name: DoClick
functions.description:
Called when the node is clicked.

See also <page>DTree_Node:DoRightClick</page>.

returnValues.description: Return true to prevent DoClick from being called on parent nodes or the <page>DTree</page> itself.

functions.name: DoRightClick
functions.description:
Called when the node is right clicked.

See also <page>DTree_Node:DoClick</page>.

returnValues.description: Return true to prevent DoRightClick from being called on parent nodes or the <page>DTree</page> itself.

functions.name: ExpandRecurse
functions.description:
Expands or collapses this node, as well as ALL child nodes of this node.

Works opposite of <page>DTree_Node:ExpandTo</page>.

arguments.name: expand
arguments.description: Whether to expand (true) or collapse (false)

functions.name: ExpandTo

Collapses or expands all nodes from the topmost-level node to this one.

Works opposite of <page>DTree_Node:ExpandRecurse</page>.

arguments.name: expand
arguments.description: Whether to expand (true) or collapse (false)

functions.name: FilePopulate
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

arguments.description: Does nothing. Set to true if called from <page>DTree_Node:PopulateChildren</page>.

arguments.name: bExpand
arguments.description: Expand self once population process is finished.

functions.name: FilePopulateCallback
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Called automatically from <page>DTree_Node:FilePopulate</page> to actually fill the node with sub-nodes based on set preferences like should files be added, etc.

arguments.name: folders

arguments.name: bAndChildren

arguments.name: wildcard
arguments.description: The wildcard that was given

functions.name: GetChildNode

Basically an alias of <page>Panel:GetChild</page>.

returnValues.description: The child panel, if valid ID is given

functions.description: Returns the number of child nodes this node has. For use with <page>DTree_Node:GetChildNode</page>

returnValues.description: Number of child nodes.

functions.name: GetChildNodes

returnValues.description: A list of all child nodes.

functions.name: GetDirty
functions.description:
<deprecated></deprecated>

Returns value set by <page>DTree_Node:SetDirty</page>.

functions.name: GetDoubleClickToOpen
functions.description: Returns whether the double clock to collapse/expand functionality is enabled on this node.

functions.name: GetDraggableName
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Returns what is set by <page>DTree_Node:SetDraggableName</page>.

functions.name: GetDrawLines
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Returns whether or not this node is drawing lines

functions.name: GetExpanded
functions.description: Returns whether the node is expanded or not.

returnValues.description: Expanded or not.

functions.name: GetFileName
functions.description: Returns the filepath of the file attached to this node.

functions.name: GetFolder
functions.description: Returns the folder path to search in, set by <page>DTree_Node:MakeFolder</page>.

returnValues.description: The folder path.

functions.name: GetForceShowExpander
functions.description:
Returns whether the expand/collapse button is shown on this node regardless of whether or not it has sub-nodes.

See also <page>DTree_Node:SetForceShowExpander</page>.

functions.name: GetHideExpander
functions.description: Returns whether the expand button (little + button) should be shown or hidden.

returnValues.description: hether the expand button should be shown or hidden.

functions.name: GetIcon
functions.description: Returns the image path to the icon of this node.

returnValues.description: The path to the image

functions.name: GetIndentSize
functions.description:
Returns the indentation level of the <page>DTree</page> this node belongs to.

Alias of <page>DTree:GetIndentSize</page>, see it for more info.

returnValues.description: The indentation level.

functions.name: GetLastChild
functions.description: Returns whether this node is the last child on this level or not.

returnValues.description: Whether this node is the last child on this level or not.

functions.name: GetLineHeight
functions.description:
The height of a single <page>DTree_Node</page> of the <page>DTree</page> this node belongs to.

Alias of <page>DTree:GetLineHeight</page>.

returnValues.description: The height of a single <page>DTree_Node</page>.

functions.name: GetNeedsChildSearch
functions.description: <internal></internal><deprecated>Seems to be unused entirely.</deprecated>Returns whether the node still needs a filesystem search for sub-nodes.

returnValues.description: Whether the node still needs a filesystem search.

functions.name: GetNeedsPopulating
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Returns whether or not the node is set to be populated from the filesystem.

functions.name: GetParentNode
functions.description: Returns the parent <page>DTree_Node</page>. Note that <page>Panel:GetParent</page> will not be the same!

returnValues.description: The parent node.

functions.name: GetPathID
functions.description:
Returns the path ID (<page>File Search Paths</page>) used in populating the <page>DTree</page> from the filesystem.

See <page>DTree_Node:SetPathID</page> and <page>DTree_Node:MakeFolder</page>.

returnValues.description: The Path ID

Returns the root node, the <page>DTree</page> this node is under.

See also <page>DTree_Node:GetParentNode</page>.

returnValues.description: The root node

functions.name: GetShowFiles
functions.description: Returns whether or not nodes for files should/will be added when populating the node from filesystem.

functions.name: GetWildCard
functions.description: Returns the wildcard set by <page>DTree_Node:MakeFolder</page>.

returnValues.description: The search wildcard

functions.name: Insert

arguments.name: nodeNextTo

arguments.name: before

functions.name: InsertNode
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Inserts an existing node as a "child" or a sub-node of this node.
Used internally by the drag'n'drop functionality.

arguments.name: node
arguments.description: Has to be <page>DTree_Node</page>

functions.name: InstallDraggable
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Called automatically internally.

Makes the target node compatible with this node's drag'n'drop.

arguments.name: node
arguments.description: The <page>DTree_Node</page>.

functions.name: InternalDoClick
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

See <page>DTree_Node:DoClick</page>

functions.name: InternalDoRightClick
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

See <page>DTree_Node:DoRightClick</page>.

functions.name: IsRootNode
functions.description: Returns true if <page>DTree_Node:GetRoot</page> is the same as <page>DTree_Node:GetParentNode</page> of this node.

returnValues.description: If this is a root node.

functions.name: LeaveTree
functions.description:
Removes given node as a sub-node of this node.

It doesn't actually remove or unparent the panel, just removes it from the internal <page>DListView</page>.

arguments.name: pnl
arguments.description: The node to remove

functions.name: MakeFolder
functions.description:
Makes this node a folder in the filesystem. This will make it automatically populated.

See also <page>DTree_Node:AddFolder</page>.

arguments.name: folder
arguments.description: The folder in the filesystem to use, relative to the garrysmod/ folder.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: The path to search in. See <page>File Search Paths</page>

arguments.name: showFiles
arguments.description: Should files be added as nodes (true) or folders only (false)

arguments.name: wildcard
arguments.description: The wildcard to use when searching for files.

arguments.name: dontForceExpandable
arguments.description: If set to true, don't show the expand buttons on empty nodes.

functions.name: MoveChildTo
functions.description:
Moves given panel to the top of the children of this node.

Despite name of this function, it cannot move the children to any position but the topmost.

arguments.name: node
arguments.description: The node to move.

functions.name: MoveToTop
functions.description: Moves this node to the top of the level.

functions.name: OnModified
functions.description: Called when sub-nodes of this <page>DTree_Node</page> were changed, such as being rearranged if that functionality is enabled.

functions.name: OnNodeAdded
functions.description: Called when a new sub-node is added this node.

arguments.name: newNode
arguments.description: The newly added sub node.

functions.name: OnNodeSelected
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Called when this or a sub node is selected. Do not use this, it is not for override.

Use <page>DTree:OnNodeSelected</page> or <page>DTree_Node:DoClick</page> instead.

functions.name: PerformRootNodeLayout
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

<internal></internal>

Called automatically from <page>DTree_Node:PopulateChildrenAndSelf</page>.

Called automatically from <page>DTree_Node:SetExpanded</page> (or when user manually expands the node) to populate the node with sub-nodes from the filesystem if this was enabled via <page>DTree_Node:MakeFolder</page>.

arguments.name: expand

<internal></internal>

<internal></internal>

<internal></internal>

functions.description:
<internal></internal>

name: DVScrollBar
description:
A generic vertical scrollbar, used in <page>DScrollPanel</page>. See the horizontal alternative [here](DHScrollBar).

The scrollbar notably contains `DVScrollBar.btnUp`, `DVScrollBar.btnDown`, and `DVScrollBar.btnGrip` which are the up button, down button, and grip respectively. Editing the paint functions of these allows custom scrollbar styling (See <page>DScrollPanel:GetVBar</page> for an example), although it is a better idea to use [Derma Skins](Derma_Skin_Creation).

functions.name: AddScroll
functions.description: Adds specified amount of scroll in pixels.

arguments.name: add
arguments.description: How much to scroll downwards. Can be negative for upwards scroll

returnValues.description: True if the scroll level was changed (i.e. if we did or did not scroll)

functions.name: AnimateTo
functions.description: Smoothly scrolls to given level.

arguments.name: scroll
arguments.description: The scroll level to animate to. In pixels from the top ( from 0 )

arguments.name: length
arguments.description: Length of the animation in seconds

arguments.name: delay
arguments.description: Delay of the animation in seconds

arguments.name: ease
arguments.description: See <page>Panel:NewAnimation</page> for explanation.

functions.name: BarScale
functions.description: Returns the scale of the scroll bar based on the difference in size between the visible "window" into the canvas that is being scrolled. Should be used after <page>DVScrollBar:SetUp</page>.

returnValues.description: The scale of the scrollbar.

functions.name: GetHideButtons
functions.description: Returns whether or not the manual up/down scroll buttons are visible or not. Set by <page>DVScrollBar:SetHideButtons</page>.

returnValues.description: Whether or not the manual up/down scroll buttons are visible or not.

functions.name: GetOffset
functions.description: Returns the negative of <page>DVScrollBar:GetScroll</page>.

returnValues.description: The scroll offset.

functions.name: GetScroll
functions.description: Returns the amount of scroll level from the top in pixels

returnValues.description: The amount of scroll level from the top

functions.name: Grip
functions.description:
<internal></internal>

Called from within <page>DScrollBarGrip</page>

functions.name: SetHideButtons
functions.description: Allows hiding the up and down buttons for better visual stylisation.

arguments.name: hide
arguments.description: True to hide

functions.name: SetScroll
functions.description: Sets the scroll level in pixels.

arguments.name: scroll
arguments.description: The new scroll value.

functions.name: SetUp
functions.description:
Sets up the scrollbar for use.

The scrollbar will automatically disable itself if the total height of the canvas is lower than the height of the panel that holds the canvas during this function call.

arguments.name: barSize
arguments.description: The size of the panel that holds the canvas, basically size of "1 page".

arguments.name: canvasSize
arguments.description: The total size of the canvas, this typically is the bigger number.

name: EditablePanel
description: Base panel used by <page>DFrame</page>, this panel is needed so that elements such as the <page>TextEntry</page> can obtain focus.

name: fingerposer
description:
<internal></internal>
A panel used by Sandbox's Finger Poser tool.

name: FingerVar
description:
<internal>
Used by the <page>fingerposer</page> panel.
</internal>

A panel used by Sandbox's Finger Poser tool.

name: Frame
description:
<deprecated>You should use <page>DFrame</page> instead.</deprecated>

A window that in which you can place just about every other component and even another frame.

name: HTML
description:
The HTML control can be used to display HTML code just like an internet browser. Unlike <page>DHTML</page>, this control cannot accept user input or complex interaction, such as retrieving image data.

**Blocked URL Extentions**

`This means your url cannot end in any of these extensions, e.g.: (http://yourdomain.com/garry.exe)`
* .exe
* .bat
* .dll
* .zip
* .mp3
* .swf

name: IconEditor
description: An icon editor that permits a user to modify a SpawnIcon and re-render it. This is used by the spawn menu and is what is shown when you right-click an icon and select `Edit Icon`. This makes use of the DAdjustableModelPanel element. This panel is only available in Sandbox and Sandbox derived gamemodes!

functions.name: AboveLayout
functions.description:
Applies the top-down view camera settings for the model in the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `Above` (third) button (See <page>IconEditor</page>).

functions.name: BestGuessLayout
functions.description:
Applies the best camera settings for the model in the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>, using the values returned by <page>Global.PositionSpawnIcon</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `wand` button (See the ) and when <page>IconEditor:Refresh</page> is called.

functions.name: FillAnimations
functions.description: <internal></internal> Fills the <page>DListView</page> on the left of the editor with the model entity's animation list. Called by <page>IconEditor:Refresh</page>.

arguments.name: ent
arguments.description: The entity being rendered within the model panel.

functions.name: FullFrontalLayout
functions.description:
Applies the front view camera settings for the model in the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `Front` (second) button (See the ).

functions.name: OriginLayout
functions.description:
Places the camera at the origin (0,0,0), relative to the entity, in the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `Center` (fifth) button (See the ).

functions.name: Refresh
functions.description:
Updates the internal <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page> and <page>SpawnIcon</page>.

This should be called immediately after setting the SpawnIcon with <page>IconEditor:SetIcon</page>.

functions.name: RenderIcon
functions.description:
Re-renders the <page>SpawnIcon</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `RENDER` button, this retrieves the render data from the internal <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page> and passes it as a table to <page>Panel:RebuildSpawnIconEx</page>.

functions.name: RightLayout
functions.description:
Applies the right side view camera settings for the model in the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>.

Called when a user clicks the `Right` (fourth) button (See the ). (Note: The icon for this points left.)

functions.name: SetDefaultLighting
functions.description: <internal></internal> Sets up the default ambient and directional lighting for the <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>. Called by <page>IconEditor:Refresh</page>.

functions.name: SetFromEntity
functions.description:
Sets the editor's model and icon from an entity. Alternative to <page>IconEditor:SetIcon</page>, with uses a <page>SpawnIcon</page>.

You do not need to call <page>IconEditor:Refresh</page> after this.

arguments.name: ent
arguments.description: The entity to retrieve the model and skin from.

functions.name: SetIcon
functions.description: Sets the <page>SpawnIcon</page> to modify. You should call <page>Panel:Refresh</page> immediately after this, as the user will not be able to make changes to the icon beforehand.

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: The <page>SpawnIcon</page> object to be modified.

functions.name: UpdateEntity
functions.description: <internal></internal> Updates the entity being rendered in the internal <page>DAdjustableModelPanel</page>. Called by the model panel's <page>DModelPanel:LayoutEntity</page> method.

arguments.name: ent
arguments.description: The entity being rendered within the model panel.

name: ImageCheckBox
description:
A checkbox panel similar to <page>DCheckBox</page> and <page>DImageButton</page> with customizable checked state image.

Uses the <page>Material</page> panel internally. Can't have a label.

<note>Will error if no material was set.</note>

functions.name: GetChecked
functions.description: Returns the checked state of the <page>ImageCheckBox</page>

returnValues.description: true for checked, false otherwise

functions.name: Set
functions.description:
Sets the checked state of the checkbox.

Checked state can be obtained by <page>ImageCheckBox</page>.State.

arguments.name: OnOff
arguments.description: true for checked, false otherwise

functions.name: SetChecked
functions.description:
Sets the checked state of the checkbox.

Checked state can be obtained via <page>ImageCheckBox:GetChecked</page>

arguments.name: bOn
arguments.description: true for checked, false otherwise

functions.name: SetMaterial
functions.description:
Sets the material that will be visible when the <page>ImageCheckBox</page> is checked.

Internally calls <page>Material:SetMaterial</page>.

<note>Will error if no material was set.</note>

arguments.name: mat
arguments.description: The file path of the material to set (relative to "garrysmod/materials/").

name: Label
description: A basic label or "single line text area" that is non-editable. You might be looking for <page>DLabel</page>, which uses this panel internally.

name: Material
description: Material is a VGUI element that renders a VMT material.

functions.name: SetAlpha
functions.description: Sets the alpha value of the Material panel.

arguments.name: alpha
arguments.description: The alpha value, from 0 to 255.

functions.name: SetMaterial
functions.description:
Sets the material used by the panel.

<note>If the material is not showing up as the correct size, try setting the Material panel's `AutoSize` variable to **false**</note>

name: MatSelect
description:
The panel used by Material & Lamp Sandbox tools for texture selection. Despite being only used in Sandbox, it is **not** exclusive to that gamemode.

See also <page>PropSelect</page> for the prop selecting alternative.

functions.name: AddMaterial
functions.description: Adds a new material to the selection list.

arguments.name: label
arguments.description: Tooltip for the material, for when the player hovers over the material.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: Path to the material. Relative to `materials/` folder (do not include it), and do not include the `.vmt` extension.

functions.name: AddMaterialEx

arguments.name: label

arguments.description: Path to the material. Relative to `materials/` folder (do not include it), and do not include the `.vmt` extension.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Overrides the "value" of the material. This will be what <page>MatSelect:OnSelect</page> receives in the first argument. It also affects <page>MatSelect:FindMaterialByValue</page>.

arguments.name: convars
arguments.description: A list of convar names (as keys) and their values to set when the user selects this material. <page>ContextBase:SetConVar</page> will be ignored.

name: ModelImage

Panel used to display models, used by <page>SpawnIcon</page>.

name: PanelList

A panel list with a custom vertical scroll bar that doesn't have up/down buttons and has a momentum to scrolling.

<deprecated>You should use <page>DScrollPanel</page> instead</deprecated>

name: PresetEditor
description:
<internal></internal>
A preset editor, which can be opened by <page>ControlPresets</page>.
This control only exists in Sandbox derived gamemodes.

name: PropSelect
description:
Used in Sandbox tools to allow the player to select models out of a list. Despite being only used in Sandbox, it is **not** exclusive to that gamemode.

See also <page>MatSelect</page> for the material selecting alternative.

name: RadioButton
description:
<internal></internal>
<deprecated></deprecated>
Currently there are no functions to retrieve checked state of a Radio Button, and their visuals are seemingly broken.

name: RichText
description:
A very versatile text display element that's used to power the default chat and console.

Rich Text panels allows multicolored, highlight-able, and interactive text using individual text segment markup (segments are defined by the <page>Panel:AppendText</page> method).

The **RichText** element has a `64000` character limit.

name: SlideBar
description:
Used as scroll bar for <page>PanelList</page>
<deprecated>
Used in deprecated  <page>PanelList</page>. Use <page>DVScrollBar</page> (Used in <page>DScrollPanel</page>).
</deprecated>

name: Slider
description:
<deprecated>
Only exists for backwards compatibility with <page>Panel:SetActionFunction</page> and <page>Panel:PostMessage</page>.
Use <page>DNumSlider</page> instead.
</deprecated>

A simple slider featuring an numeric display.

name: SpawnIcon
description:
A "spawn icon" displays an image for the given model path.
It is mostly used in the Spawn Menu (<key>Q</key>).
It uses <page>ModelImage</page> internally.

functions.name: GetBodyGroup
functions.description:
Returns the currently active <page text="Sub Model IDs">Structures/BodyGroupData#submodels</page> for each Body Group of the spawn icon.

This is set by <page>SpawnIcon:SetBodyGroup</page>.

returnValues.description: The Body Groups of the spawnicon

functions.name: GetModelName
functions.description: Returns the currently set model name. This is set by <page>SpawnIcon:SetModelName</page>.

returnValues.description: The model name

functions.name: GetSkinID
functions.description: Returns the currently set skin of the spawnicon. This is set by <page>SpawnIcon:SetSkinID</page>.

returnValues.description: Current skin ID

functions.name: OpenMenu
functions.description: Called when right clicked on the SpawnIcon. It will not be called if there is a selection (<page>Panel:GetSelectionCanvas</page>), in which case <page>SANDBOX:SpawnlistOpenGenericMenu</page> is called.

functions.name: SetBodyGroup
functions.description:
<internal>This is done automatically by SpawnIcon. You do not need to call this. Doing so may cause unforeseen consequences.</internal>

Sets the active <page text="Sub Model ID">Structures/BodyGroupData#submodels</page> for the given <page text="Body Group 		ID">Structures/BodyGroupData#id</page>, so it can be retrieved with <page>SpawnIcon:GetBodyGroup</page>.

Use <page>Panel:SetModel</page> instead.

arguments.name: bodyGroupId
arguments.description:
The Body Group ID to set the active Sub Model ID for.
Body Group IDs start at `0`.

arguments.name: activeSubModelId
arguments.description:
The Sub Model ID to set as active.
Sub Model IDs start at `0`.

functions.name: SetModelName
functions.description:
<internal>This is done automatically by SpawnIcon. You do not need to call this. Doing so may cause unforeseen consequences.</internal>

Sets the model name, so it can be retrieved with <page>SpawnIcon:GetModelName</page>. Use <page>Panel:SetModel</page> instead.

arguments.name: mdl
arguments.description: The model name to set

functions.name: SetSkinID
functions.description:
<internal>This is done automatically by SpawnIcon. You do not need to call this. Doing so may cause unforeseen consequences.</internal>

Sets the skin id of the spawn icon, so it can be retrieved with <page>SpawnIcon:GetSkinID</page>. Use <page>Panel:SetModel</page> instead.

arguments.name: skin
arguments.description: Skin ID to set
